item.title: Why do I prefer Arch Linux?
item.author: developer@freakydu.de (freakydude)
item.description: Hi guys, I will start a series of posts about configuring Arch Linux in a slim, straightforward way. But let me begin with some pros and cons about the Arch Linux distribution here. The Arch Linux distribution describes itself as “a lightweight and flexible Linux distribution that tries to Keep It Simple” Thats it - Arch Linux is absolutely the right distribution for you, if you like a system, what only does, what you have installed and configured.
